page.title: 14EASTERN COUNTY FARMERS
page.content: Eastern Country Farmers is a co-operative that has been in business since 1962.At the moment costs Â£25 to join but will soon go to Â£100. 20 people are employed by E.C.F. in Gt. Leighs.In the stores they sell clothing,groceries,animal feed,and other items required by the Farmer.They also sell various farm machinery,second hand and new.A three year old combine harvester was sold for Â£28000.New harvesters cost Â£60000. A new tractor cost Â£20000 and they sell about 12 a year.Much of the second hand farm machinery is sold abroad.The fuel tanks hold 240,000 litres and cost between 19p a ltr for heating oil and 38p a ltr for diesel.They sell more ploughs than any other farm machinery,but make most profit in the stores.
